Articles.Content:
Hey! So, this has been happening to me for a while. Even after I upgraded to a new, better PC. I'll have been in the SPH for a while constructing a plane, it happens when I get to the wings, and the symmetry will just, break(?). It will now only accept a part's placement with radial symmetry, very frustrating. Anyone know any solutions? 

Here's a video of the occurrence:

 

Thanks in advance!

Edited February 10, 2017 by Templar

Because these parts are attached in radial symmetry not mirror symmetry. You can see that when you take the wing piece off, it automatically changes to radial symmetry mode. The reason it's in radial symmetry is probably because its parent part is in radial symmetry. When a parent part is in one symmetry mode, you can't attach child parts to it under another symmetry mode or different number of symmetry.

To solve the problem, you need to detach the wing pieces, make sure they are in mirror symmetry mode (press R if it's not in the correct mode) before attaching them to the fuselage.

The parent parts weren't placed in radial symmetry. 

Edited February 11, 2017 by Templar

Here's another video:
 

 

It shows the placement of the original wing in mirrored symmetry and then the eventual glitch into radial symmetry.

With the key "R" you can switch between SPH and VAB mode

Try pressing it twice, often solve a similar issue in the SPH for me
At 2:25 in the second vid you activate the root tool and assign a new root part, this may have caused your issue?

Your issue looked really hard to reproduce -- it looked like you had to try messing with the plane 20 times to make it happen. Are you using any mods?

I'd like to file a bug report about it, but I sure hope you can find & tell me a more reliable way to make it happen.

It's fully stock. 

It happens to me so often, maybe it's because of the way I design my planes and wings, I don't know. It just happens.
supply the craft file of your plane so others can play with it and reproduce it?

That's a great idea:
 

here it is
After a while of not using the SPH, I've come back. The glitch is still occurring. I don't know what to do. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

@Templar:

why did you set your Vids to private?

Cant follow this threat then - we will all help, so why do you bothering us?
